name: RoastThemBlu
0:
”Alexa, open roast them blu”
”Alexa, start roast them blu”
”Alexa, ask roast them blu for a burn”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roast them blu
des:
Try these lighthearted burns to add more fun to your day. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next burn. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
